content.question: What does the speaker say is special about Japanese bookstores?

choices.label: They carry many books in foreign languages.
Employees put paper covers on books that are purchased.
They offer few products other than books.
Customers can read books while enjoying tea or coffee.

content.answer: Employees put paper covers on books that are purchased.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
